1. Develop and customize existing WordPress themes or create custom themes from scratch using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP
2. Improve the user experience and interactivity of the website through the creation of animations and dynamic features
3. Ensure website compatibility with major browsers and mobile devices
4. Provide a great browsing experience to users, ensuring that the website is intuitive and easy to use
5. Keep the website updated and implement the features requested by the customer
6. Manage your activities independently while respecting the agreed deadlines

Requirements:

1. Excellent knowledge of WordPress and its development features
2. Ability to create custom themes for WordPress using PHP
3. Experience in using WordPress plugins to improve site functionality
4. Strong attention to detail and the quality of the work done
5. Excellent communication and time management skills
6. Willingness to work on ad hoc projects and meet agreed deadlines
7. Possession of computer equipment and stable and fast internet connection. CSS , Figma , Git , GitHub , HTML , JavaScript , jQuery , PHP , WordPress
